title: SOHI Soil Metadata Standard v1.0
description: Standardized schema for agricultural soil metagenome metadata harmonizing pH, texture, and nutrient pools.

sample_id.description: Unique identifier for the biological sample.

ph_h2o.description: Soil pH measured in water (1:1 or 1:2.5).

soc_percent.description: Soil Organic Carbon expressed as a percentage.

pmn_mg_kg.description: Potentially Mineralizable Nitrogen (anaerobic incubation) in mg/kg.
